hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(endswith(".ts") or endswith(".js") or endswith(".json"))' | xargs -r pnpm fix && pnpm type-check
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(. == "wrangler.jsonc" or . == ".env" or . == ".env.local")' | xargs -r sh -c 'if [ -n "$0" ]; then pnpm cf-typegen; fi'
